title: Please bring Morgana back to the mid lane when you rework her.
body: I really like {{champion:25}}  because of her versatile kit but she is rarely played in mid nowadays. I like playing her as a support too but  I think AP carry mage suits her more than a support.

replies.body:
ummm
morg is my main after {{champion:76}}  
and she is my main in the support role

and honestly while i have played her both mid and support

she NEEDS to stay support.

morg in mid lane not only ins horrendously broken because your laner flat out can't interact with you at all.

walk up press W on wave.. walk back under tower

opponent cant even gank because of black shield

it was so incredibly boring to play her mid she was taken support

but its also boring for the player playing against her.

in the support role she is much more interactive in the lane... protecting her ADC and herself and worries about 2 different champs and whether she should shield herself or her adc as well as warding and watching the map and other lanes while trying to land snares watch for ganks, protect her adc and try to set up kills.

mid lane more is again just "walk up, press W, walk back under tower"

she NEEDS to stay support

That's why she'd need a more proper rework, especially in her W.  That's your main issue and that's what they're changing most.

Don't worry though, Morg will likely be forced 100% into support with the changes (remember Zyra?).

She needs a new form of wave clear. I'm up for an AoE waveclear that is champion centric (like she has to target a champion ally or foe or herself that does an AoE nuke on minions or jungle camps). It would feel good.

Riot has stated that they will mostly change her W and passive.
This will mean that her support skill part will stay as they are (Q E R).
I still wish that morgana has one spell that nullify kayle spell while she has one that nullify morgana spell.

I still love playing her in Mid when I go mid. She is who I main, so must continue to keep her alive before and after update <3

As for the Role in that Poll, I cannot choose as I love her in both XD So I'd rather keep some champions a bit more open rather than push them into a certain role.
